parameters.name: ConfigId
parameters.description: Configuration ID. It can be obtained by calling the [ListImageTransforms](~~2869056~~) interface.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Indicates whether to enable image transformation. Possible values:

- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: Rule
parameters.description:
Rule content, used to match user requests with conditional expressions. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration. There are two usage scenarios:
- To match all incoming requests: Set the value to true.
- To match specific requests: Set the value to a custom expression, for example: (http.host eq "video.example.com")

parameters.name: RuleEnable
parameters.description:
Rule switch. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration. Possible values:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: Rule name. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) interface.
